name: Soulflowers
description:
Follow the story of a man that ran away from his life and found himself lost in unfamiliar woods shivering and starving, but determined to stay alive. Wandering around aimlessly he finds himself nearly losing his life, yet fate is not yet done with him and his salvation comes in the form of two odd witches. With his will rekindled he decides to return home, but finds that this may be more challenging than it may first seem. Join the nameless man in an epic adventure as he unravels the mysteries and dark secrets of the place he stumbled into, accompanied in this quest by his saviors that aid him for their own reasons.

Official website (with Guide): https://soulflowers.web.app/Pages/Soulflowers
